CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-08-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: : > are gaara rea 2016/KER/34106 Crl.MC.No. 1627 of 2016 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al COPY OF COMPLAINT DATED 13.9.2012 FILED BY 187 RESPONDENT BEFORE THE COMMISSIONER OF POLICE, THRISSUR ANNEXURE A2 TRUE COPY OF COMMON JUDGMENT DATED 18.11.2014 IN OP 2159/2010, 2197/2010, 9/2011, 14/2011, 2008/2012 AND 4/2013 IN FAMILY COURT, THRISSUR. ANNEXURE A3 TRUE COPY OF JUDGMENT DATED 9.6.2015 IN MAT APPEAL 1152/2014 RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS > NIL /TRUE COPY/ P. A. TO JUDGE Pn Bel 2016/KER/34106 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Dated this the 4" day of August, 2016 ORDER The petitioner seeks to quash all further proceedings arising from Annexure 1, now pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court - 1, Thrissur as C.C.No.320/2013. It seems that, there were several disputes between the petitioner herein and the 1* respondent. One of the case was disposed of by this Court by Annexure A3 judgment, pursuant to the settlement arrived at in a mediation. 2. | When the matter was taken up, learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that, all amounts payable by the petitioner herein has been directly paid through the trial court. Since the 1* respondent was appearing through Mr.Santhosh Poduval in the other connected cases, notice on R1 was served on Mr.Santhosh Poduval, who appeared and submitted that, the entire amounts due have been received. Respondents 3 to 8 are represented by another counsel. 3. Having heard all the counsel, | am satisfied that the disputes have been settled to the satisfaction to the parties. In Berl pea 2016/KER/34106 Cri. M. C. No. 1627 of 2016 2 the light of the above, all further proceedings in C.C.No.320/2013 pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court - 1, Thrissur stand quashed. Crl.M.C. stands disposed of accordingly. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS, JUDGE. Pn
